name: Heart Knots
description:
Heart Knots is a mystery horror RPG game made with RPG Maker VX Ace.

♥️Story：

Tong is a junior high school student. One day she got up in her room as usual. As preparing for school, she suddenly found everything changed at home.
She didn't want to be late for school so decided to look around what was going on.

♥️Controls：

Arrow Keys：Move Character
ESC/X：Menu, Cancel
Enter/Z/Space：Talk, Check, Confirm
Shift+Arrow Keys：Run
Press F5/F6 to make the screen bigger. 
Alt+Enter:Full Screen

Progress can be saved by checking the red heart.
Items are not used automatically.
Stand in front of an object to interact with and use 
an item from the menu.

♥️Team：

★Story/Art/Development：Starwing
★Logo：Yuxi
★Character Sprites：Xiyu
★Music：Larz
★Plug-in Support：Cafel

★Voice Acting:

 Rindre-Tong 

Mr.Fenglanglinyou-An

♥️Development：

The game is currently in development.

The demo currently covers the Prologue of the game
